markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
# --description-- Within your `.keys` element, add seven `div` elements. Give them all the class `key`. # --hints-- You should create seven new `div` elements. ```js const divDivDiv = document.querySelectorAll('div'); assert(divDivDiv?.length === 9); ``` Your seven new `div` elements should be within your `.keys` element. ```js const keys = document.querySelector('.keys'); assert([...keys?.children].length === 7); assert([...keys?.children].every(child => child?.tagName === 'DIV')); ``` Your seven new `div` elements should all have the `class` set to `key`. ```js const keys = document.querySelector('.keys'); assert([...keys?.children].every(child => child?.classList?.contains('key'))); ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```html Piano --fcc-editable-region--
--fcc-editable-region-- ``` ```css ```
